src.name: 有数据的年份
src.sql: select distinct substr(zwrq_jk,1,4) nian from YSSR_INDEX order by substr(zwrq_jk,1,4) desc

src.name: 有数据的月份
src.sql: select distinct substr(zwrq_jk,1,4) nian,substr(zwrq_jk,5,2) yue,substr(zwrq_jk,1,6) ny from YSSR_INDEX order by substr(zwrq_jk,1,6) desc

src.name: 有数据的日期
src.sql: select distinct substr(zwrq_jk,1,6) ny,substr(zwrq_jk,7,2) ri from YSSR_INDEX order by zwrq_jk desc
